lines.text: Maybe... the idea was to add heat to make the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard's</c> shell dry on faster.
Yeah- it was liquid concrete, right? So to make sure it set quickly, he cooked it a bit.
...Uh. Maybe, but this level of destruction's a little excessive for-
Wait, no. The <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> got shot before the fire got big enough to trip the alarm.
Why would he be workin' on a disguise like that while Slick was in the room?
...Leavin' aside why he'd be workin' on that at all.
Um... hm, yeah, the timeline doesn't really match up, does it?
